div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
ذكر حق يونة يونة ابنت حليصى على زوجها يزيد بن قاسم
الخرّاز الخرّاز عليه عشرة الدّنانير وزن المثاقيل الجديد عينا
ذهبا نقد جيّد وهذا العشرة الدّنانير حالّة
ليونة ابنت حليصى على زوجها يزيد بن قاسم الجرّار الخراز
والعشرة الدّنانير بقيّة صداقها ومن قام بالذّكر الحق
اقتضاه ومن أحالت عليه أقر لها بحقّها شهد على ذلك
اليسع بن عيسى وهو كاتب الصّك وشهادته في انسلاخ
صفر سنة ثلث وثلثين ومائتن
وموسى بن هرون بن أبي هرون وكتب شهادته على يزيد الجرّار الخرّاز بجميع ما في
هذا الصّك وشهادته في شهر ربيع الأوّل من سنة اثنين وثلثين ومائتين
شهد داود بن سليمن على إقرار يزيد بن قاسم الجرّار الخرّاز بجميع ما في
هذا الكتاب في شهر ربيع الأوّل من سنة ثلثة وثلثين ومائتن
شهد لقمان بن سليمن على إقرار يزيد بن قاسم الخرّاز الخرّاز بجميع ما في هذا
الكتاب وشهادته في انسلاخ صفر سنة ثلثة وثلثين وماپپپن ومائتين
شهد اليسع بن عبد الوهّاب على إقرار يزيد الجرّار الخرّاز بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
‮في شهر ربيع الأوّل من سنة ثلثة وثلثين ومائتن ‪σλγ‬‬
شهد عبد الكريم بن موسى على إقرار يزيد الجرّار الخرّاز بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
‮وعبد اللّه بن موسى وكتب شهادته بخطّه سپه ‪σλγ‬‬
وعبد الصّمد بن عبد الرّحمن بن إسمعيل وكتب شهادته بخطّه
شهد رفاعة بن إسحق على يزيد بن قاسم الخرّاز الخرّاز بجميع ما في
هذا الكتاب وشهادته في شهر ربيع الأوّل سنة ثلثة وثلثين ومائتن
شهد يحيى بن صفوان المرادي على يزيد بن قاسم الجرّار الخرّاز بجميع ما في هذا
الصّك وشهادته في شهر ربيع الأوّل من سنة ثلثة وثلثين ومائتن
شهد مــحمّــد بن جزى جزىّ جزى حرّىّ الــإبريّ الأزدى على يزيد بن قاسم الخرّاز الخرّاز بجميع ما في هذا الصّك وشهادته في صفر سنة ثلثة
وثلثين ومائتن
شهد عبد الرّحمن بن عبّاس بن عبد الرّحن بن سلام القرشي على إقرار يزيد بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
وعبد اللّه بن زكري وكتب شهادته على إقرار يزيد بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
شهد عبد الــلّه بن الحجّاج على إقرار يزيد الدّبّاغ بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
في ذي الحجّة سنة خمس وأربعين ومائتين وأحمد بن موسى وكتب شهادته بخطه
وعبد الصّمد بن هرون وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وحميد بن عبيد وكتب شهادته بيده بجميع ما في هاذا
الكتاب وعمر بن محمّد بن عمران وكتب شهادته على إقرار يزيد بن قاسم الخرّاز الخرّاز في شوّال سنة خمس
وأربعين ومائتن
وحسين بن علي الخراساني وكتب شهادته على إقرار يزيد بن قاسم الخرّاز الخرّاز بجميع ما في هذا الصّك وعيسى بن موسى وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وعلي بن مومل وكتب شهادته على إقرار يزيد بن قاسم الدّبّاغ
بجميع ما في هذا الصّك ومحمّد بن مومل وكتب
شهادته بخطّه ومحمّد بن أحمد وكتب
شهادته بخطّه وحاتم بن المسيّب وكتب
شهادته بخطّه وعبد اللّه بن محمّد
بن علي وكتب شهادته بخطّه
ومسرور بن ميمون وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وعلي بن حسين بن عــليّ الخراساني وكتب شهادته بخطّه
كتاب
فيه صداق يونه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ḏikru ḥaqqi yūnaẗa yūnaha ĭbnati ḥilīṣà ʿalà zawǧi hā yazīda bni qāsim:ini
ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi ʿalay hi ʿašaraẗu ăd danānīri wazna ăl maṯāqīli ăl ǧadīda ʿayn:an
ḏahab:an naqd ǧayyid wa hāḏā ăl ʿašaraẗu ăd danānīri ḥāllaẗ:un
li yūnaha ĭbnati ḥilīṣà ʿalà zawǧi hā yazīda bni ăl qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi
wa ăl ʿašaraẗu ăd danānīri baqiyyaẗu ṣadāqi hā wa man qāma bi ăḏ ḏikri ăl ḥaqqa
ĭqtaḍā hu wa man ʾaḥālat ʿalay hi ʾaqarra la hā bi ḥaqqi hā šahida ʿalà ḏālika
ăl yasaʿu bnu ʿīsà wa huwa kātibu ăṣ ṣakki wa šahādatu hu fī ĭnsilāḫi
ṣafar:in sanaẗa ṯalāṯ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatayni *
wa mūsà bnu hārūna bni ʾabī hārūna wa kataba šahādata hu ʿalà yazīda ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī
hāḏā ăṣ ṣakki wa šahādatu hu fī šahri rabīʿa ăl ʾawwali min sanaẗi ĭṯnayni wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatayni *
šahida dāwūdu bnu sulaymāna ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī
hāḏā ăl kitābi fī šahri rabīʿa ăl ʾawwali min sanaẗi ṯalāṯaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatay
šahida luqmānu bnu sulaymāna ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā
ăl kitābi wa šahādatu hu fī ĭnsilāḫi ṣafar:in sanaẗa ṯalāṯaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna ø wa ø miʾatayni
šahida ăl yasaʿu bnu ʿabdi ăl wahhābi ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi
fī šahri rabīʿa ăl ʾawwali min sanaẗi ṯalāṯaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatayni 233
šahida ʿabdu ăl karīmi bnu mūsà ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi
wa ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu mūsà wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi * sanaẗa 233
wa ʿabdu ăṣ ṣamadi bnu ʿabdi ăr raḥmāni bni ʾismāʿīla wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi *
šahida rifāʿaẗu bnu ʾisḥāqa ʿalà yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī
hāḏā ăl kitābi wa šahādatu hu fī šahri rabīʿa ăl ʾawwali sanaẗi ṯalāṯaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatayni
šahida yaḥyà bnu ṣafwāna ăl murādiyyu ʿalà yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā
ăṣ ṣakki wa šahādatu hu fī šahri rabīʿa ăl ʾawwali min sanaẗi ṯalāṯaẗ:in wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatayni
šahida muḥammadu bnu ḥarriyy:ini ǧazī ǧurayy:ini ǧuzayy:ini ăl ʾibriyyu ʾazdiyyu ʿalà yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăṣ ṣakki wa šahādatu hu fī ṣafar:in sanaẗa ṯalāṯaẗ:in
wa ṯalāṯīna wa miʾatayni
šahida ʿabdu ăr raḥmāni bnu ʿabbāsa bni ʿabdi ăr raḥmāni bni salāma ăl qurašiyyu ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi
wa ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu zakariya zikrī wa kataba šahādata hu ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi *
šahida ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu ăl ḥaǧǧāǧi ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda ăd dabbāġi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi *
fī ḏī ăl ḥiǧǧaẗi sanaẗa ḫams:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾatayni * wa ʾaḥmadu bnu mūsà wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi
wa ʿabdu ăṣ ṣamadi bnu hārūna wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi
ḥamīdu ḥumaydu bnu ʿubayd:in wa kataba šahādata hu bi yadi hi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā
ăl kitābi wa ʿumaru bnu muḥammadi bni ʿimrāna wa kataba šahādata hu ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi fī šawwāl:in sanaẗa ḫams:in
wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾatayni
wa ḥusaynu bnu ʿaliyy:ini ăl ḫurāsāniyyu wa kataba šahādata hu ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăl ǧarrāri ḫarrāzi bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăṣ ṣakki wa ʿīsà bnu mūsà wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi *
wa ʿaliyyu bnu muʾammal:in wa kataba šahādata hu ʿalà ʾiqrāri yazīda bni qāsim:ini ăd dabbāġi
bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăṣ ṣakki wa muḥammadu bnu muʾammal:in wa kataba
šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi * wa muḥammadu bnu ʾaḥmada wa kataba
šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi * wa ḥātimu bnu ăl musayyabi wa kataba
šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi * wa ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu muḥammadi
bni ʿaliyy:in wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi *
wa masrūru bnu maymūn:in wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi *
wa ʿaliyyu bnu ḥusayni bni ʿaliyy:ini ăl ḫurāsāniyyu wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi *
kitāb:un
fī hi ṣadāqu yūnaha

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux ! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful!
Lettre d'obligation établissant le droit de Yūna fille de Ḥelīṣa sur son mari Yazīd Ibn Qāsim, Record of what is due to Yûna, daughter of Helîṣâ, from her husband Yazîd b. Qâsim,
fabricant de seaux en cuir; il lui doit dix dīnārs pesés nouvellement en miṯqāl-s, en pièces the leather-bottle merchant; he owes ten dînârs of new standard-weight gold-
coins, good pieces and these ten dînârs fall due d'or, en bons étalons monétaires; et ces dix dīnārs sont payables
à Yūna fille de Ḥelīṣā, à la charge de son mari Yazīd Ibn Qāsim, fabricant de seaux en cuir; to the credit of Yûna, daughter of Helîṣâ, to the debit of her husband Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant;
and the ten dînârs are the remainder of her nuptial gift, and whoever presents himself with (this) written obligation et les dix dīnārs sont le reste de sa dot; quiconque apparaît avec la lettre d'obligation,
en reçoit (le montant); et celui à qui elle renvoie, lui reconnaît sa revendication. Ont témoigné de cela shall receive (its amount), and he to whom she cedes (the bill) thereby recognizes her right (to obtain payment). (The following witnesses) have testified to it:
Al-Yasaʿ b. ʿÎsâ, who is the writer of the bill, and his testimony has been given on the last of Al-Yasaʿ Ibn ʿĪsā, qui est le scribe de ce titre d'obligation et dont le témoignage eut lieu à la fin
Ṣafar of the year two hundred and thirty three. (Paragraph sign). de ṣafar de l'année deux cent trente-trois,
And Mûsâ b. Hârûn b. Abî Hârûn, who has written his testimony to the obligation of Yazîd, the leather-bottle merchant, with regard to all that (is contained) in et Mūsā Ibn Hārūn Ibn Abī Hārūn, qui écrivit son témoignage concernant Yazīd le fabricant de seaux en cuir, par rapport à tout le contenu de
ce titre d'obligation, son témoignage eut lieu au mois de rabīʿ I de l'année deux sent trente-deux. this bill, and his testimony has been given in the month of Rabîʿ I of the year two hundred and thirty two. (Handmark).
A témoigné Dāwūd Ibn Sulaymān de la reconnaissance de Yazīd Ibn Qāsim, le fabricant de seaux en cuir, de tout de qui est dans Dâwûd b. Sulaimân is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all that (is contained) in
ce document, au mois de rabīʿ I de l'année deux cent trente-trois. this act in the month of Rabîʿ I of the year two hundred and thirty three.
Luqmân b. Sulaimân is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all that (is contained) in this
act, and his testimony has been given on the last of Ṣafar of the year (two hundred) and thirty three.
Al-Yasaʿ b. ʿAbd al-Wahhâb is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all that (is contained) in this act,
in the month of Rabîʿ I of the year two hundred and thirty three 233.
ʿAbd al-Karîm b. Mûsâ is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all that (is contained) in this act.
And ʿAbdallâh b. Mûsâ, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting (in the) year 233.
And ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad b. ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. Ismaʿîl, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. (Pentagramm). And ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad b. ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. Ismâʿîl, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. (Pentagramm).
Rifâʿa b. Isḥâq is witness to the obligation of Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all that (is contained) in
this act, and his testimony has been given in the month of Rabîʿ I of the year two hundred and thirty three.
Yaḥyâ b. Ṣafwân, the Murâdite, is witness to the obligation of Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all that (is contained) in this
bill and his testimony has been given in the month of Rabîʿ I of the year two hundred and thirty three.
Mu[ḥamm]ad b. Gurayy, the needle-maker, is witness to the obligation of Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting (all) that (is contained) in this bill, and his testimony has been given on Ṣafar of the year Mu[ḥamm]ad b. Ǧurayy, the needle-maker, is witness to the obligation of Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting (all) that (is contained) in this bill, and his testimony has been given on Ṣafar of the year
two hundred and thirty three.
ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. ʿAbbâs b. ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. Salâm, the Qorashit, is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd respecting all that (is contained) in this act. ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. ʿAbbâs b. ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. Salâm, the Qorašite, is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd respecting all that (is contained) in this act.
And ʿAbdallâh b. Zakariya, and he has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd respecting all that (is contained) in this act. (Handmark).
ʿAbdallâh b. al-Ḥaǧǧāǧ is witness to the acknowledgment by Yazîd, the tanner, respecting all that (is contained) in this act (Handmark),
in Dhuʾl-Ḥigga of the year two hundred and forty five. And Aḥmad b. Mûsâ and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. in Ḏuʾl-Ḥiǧǧa of the year two hundred and forty five. And Aḥmad b. Mûsâ and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad b. Harûn, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting And ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad b. Hârûn, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting
And Ḥumaid b. ʿUbaid - and he has written his testimony with his (own) hand - concerning all that (is contained) in this And Ḥumaid b. ʿUbaid - and he has written his testimony with his (own) hand - respecting all that (is contained) in this
act. And ʿUmar b. Muḥammad b. ʿImrân, and he has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, in Shawwâl of the year two act. And ʿUmar b. Muḥammad b. ʿImrân is witness, and he has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, in Šawwâl of the year two
hundred and <forty> five. hundred and forty five.
And Ḥusain b. ʿAlî, originating from Khurâsân, and he has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all, that (is contained) in this bill. And ʿÎsâ b. Mûsâ, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. And Ḥusain b. ʿAlî, originating from Ḫurâsân, and he has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the leather-bottle merchant, respecting all, that (is contained) in this bill. And ʿÎsâ b. Mûsâ, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And ʿAlî b. Muʾammal, and he has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim, the tanner,
respecting all that (is contained) in this bill. And Muḥammad b. Muʾammal, and he has written
his testimony in his (own) handwriting. And Muḥammad b. Aḥmad, and he has written
his testimony in his (own) handwriting. And Ḥâtim b. al-Musayyab, and he has written
his testimony in his (own) handwriting. And ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad
b. ʿAlî, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And Masrûr b. Maimûn, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And ʿAlî b. Ḥusain b. ʿAlî, originating from Khurâsân, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. (Hexagram). And ʿAlî b. Ḥusain b. ʿAlî, originating from Ḫurâsân, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. (Hexagram).
Document
containing the nuptial gift of Yûna. contenant la dot de Yūna.
